name: Sea To Summit Comfort Light Insulated Air Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Comfort Light Insulated Air Sleeping Pad
description: Pop this sleeping pad in your backpack and get out on the trails, it's plenty comfortable for 3.5-season use thanks to an R-value of 3.7. A matrix of dot-patterned welds and air cells act independently, like a pocket-spring mattress, to conform to your body shape for a comfortable, stable sleep.Quite Exkin Platinum® nylon face fabric with non-slip surfaces on the top and bottom.Hybrid-Layer Air Sprung Cells with ThermoLite® insulation are comfortable and prevent heat loss.Double-layered cells under torso for increased warmth and comfort.Multi-fuctional one-way inflate valve flips over to prevent air re-entering during deflation.Includes pump sack, repair kit, and PillowLock™ for use with Aeros™ pillows.
